text:
e="preserve">Altaf Fatima (1927 – 29 November 2018) was a Pakistani Urdu novelist, short-story writer, and teacher. She was born in Lucknow. Her novel "Dastak Na Do" ("The One Who Did Not Ask ") is thought as one of the best works in the Urdu language.
Fatima died on 29 November 2018 in Lahore from a stroke at the age of 91.
